pages.text: The $(d)Floo network$() allows you to teleport between different $(3)Floo Fireplaces$() within the same dimension.$(br2)To make a Fireplace, use a $(d)Floo Sign$() on Bricks in the world. It will turn into $(3)Floo Bricks$(), sharing the Sign's custom anvil name.
pages.title: Floo Network

pages.text: If the Sign was not named, the Fireplace will also not be named. Nameless Fireplaces $(c)cannot be teleported to$(). but can be teleported from.$(br2)To teleport to a Fireplace, stand on any other Fireplace and then $(3)say its name in chat$().$(br2)Teleporting requires Floo Powder; see the next page for details.
To teleport, you need to be holding $(d)Floo Powder$() in your hand. It will consume a single item per teleport.

Alternatively, you can hold a $(d)Floo Pouch$(), which can hold up to 128 Floo Powder and works when held anywhere in your inventory.$(br2)Sneak right-click the Floo Pouch to fill it up with Floo Powder from your inventory.
